title: Snow Day Malzahar skin
body: The Recall animation for Snow Day Malzahar is glitched out and has been for about a month now. When you begin to recall, the voidling poro is solid blue(besides its legs) and it stays that gltiched out blue through the entire recall animation. Just wanted to inform you guys in case it's not just my client .

replies.body:
Hey My Name Is 7 -

This was fixed in 6.5. Have you tried looking once you've updated to the new patch? :3
